name: org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.predicates.HasHeaderKey
overview: A predicate which is true for records with at least one header with the configured name.

name: org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.predicates.RecordIsTombstone
overview: A predicate which is true for records which are tombstones (i.e. have null value).

name: org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.predicates.TopicNameMatches
overview: A predicate which is true for records with a topic name that matches the configured regular expression.

config.name: pattern
config.documentation: A Java regular expression for matching against the name of a record's topic.
